DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : The investigator register end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) patient receive peritoneal dialysis ( PD ) treatment , develop PD database China . Patients ' demographic characteristic ( include age , gender , height , weight , BMI , smoking , drinking , education , etc ) , clinical characteristic ( primary cause ESRD , dialysis prescription , patient 's condition lab measurement serum , urine , dialysate ) , drug information , complication score quality life baseline collect . Patients follow every 3 month . Demographic clinical characteristic , complication , drug information patient collect visit . The patient ' clinical outcome , mortality ( include all-cause mortality cardiovascular disease mortality ) , technical survival , kidney transplantation , transfer hemodialysis , hospitalization , occurrence peritonitis , etc . also follow till end study . The data patient survival , technical survival , peritonitis rate , hospitalization rate , clinical lab parameter , longitudinal change residual renal function peritoneum function , peritonitis rate , hospitalization rate , clinical lab parameter quality life PD patient analyze use PD database .
